Unresponsive on the verge of being a scam.

When booking directly through the hotel's website there is no option to cancel (even for the free cancellation option). The hotel is not responding to email/phone calls, then charges you full price for "no show", without notification.

I emailed the hotel, more than once, 10 days prior to our booking date (free cancellation is valid 48 hours prior to booking date), still no response, as well as on the phone. Now they charged my credit card for full price.

I highly recommend not to book at all, but if you do - only from a trusted booking site. Beware!

I liked this hotel. May be it's not 5*, but very comfortable, clean and we enjoyed our stay. Friendly, very helpful staff, nice delicious breakfast, big room. Most important walking distance to the best places in Florence: cathedral, gallery, square... you don't need taxi to reach those famous touristic places, just 10-15 min walk, amazing. Definitely coming back

We booked a room for our stay in Florence through the official website of the hotel, with free cancellation 48 hours prior to the booking date, which is at a higher rate.

Unfortunately we were not able to come, so we had to cancel. As there is no option to cancel through the hotel‚Äôs website, we emailed them 10 days prior to our reservation - no answer. Also no answer on the phone. Eventually they charged us full price, and still no answer.

Beware! The hotel itself might be good, but never trust them or book directly through their website!

We really enjoyed this lovely, clean and modern hotel. It‚Äôs in a great location, just a short, safe and very pleasant walk to all of the main attractions of Florence. Great breakfast in a charming room with very helpful staff. I would recommend and plan to stay again when next in Firenze.
